messages.title: My priorities
messages.content: The prosperity of Edinburgh South relies on strong links to Europe and the rest of the UK. With even more cuts coming from the SNP and Tory Governments we need to stay in both the UK and the EU to keep our economy strong. Scottish Liberal Democrats are the only party opposing a hard Brexit and Independence.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats are a pro UK Party and oppose the SNP's plan for a second independence referendum.
Theresa May and the Conservatives are making a destructive hard Brexit agenda which will have serious impact on the British economy.
We know that education is the chance for every person to get on in life. We will invest in Scottish education from nursery to colleges.
Mental health in Scotland needs urgent investment. Young people still wait up to a year for treatment.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Scottish Liberal Democrats could be winners.

issues.brexitEurope: Scottish Liberal Democrats are the only party opposing a hard Brexit and Independence.
issues.education: We will invest in Scottish education from nursery to colleges.
issues.health: Mental health in Scotland needs urgent investment. Young people still wait up to a year for treatment.

leaflet.personalStatement: Vote for a local champion not a cheerleader for independence

endorsements.endorsement: Only the Lib Dems can stop a hard Brexit
Lib Dems to oppose second independence referendum
The Liberal Democrats could be winners.
